item.title: Post in rmarkdown
item.author: sergio.uribe@gmail.com (Sergio Uribe)
item.description: Exploratory data analysis of medical data install.packages("pubh") library(pubh) library(tidyverse) Dataset data(Hodgkin) Exploring the raw dataset head(Hodgkin)## Error in head(Hodgkin): objeto 'Hodgkin' no encontrado Summary tables Hodgkin %>% gather(key = "Cell", value = value, CD4:CD8) %>% group_by(Group, Cell) %>% summarise(Mean = mean(value)) %>% spread(Cell, Mean)## Error in Hodgkin %>% gather(key = "Cell", value = value, CD4:CD8) %>% : no se pudo encontrar la funci√≥n "%>%" Visualizations Histogram Hodgkin %>% mutate("CD4/CD8 ratio" = CD4 / CD8) %>% ggplot(aes(x = `CD4/CD8 ratio`, fill = Group)) + geom_histogram(bins = 9, alpha = 0.
